title: [Large-scale] Developmental Approach Workshop for Doctoral Dissertation Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Academic Writing and Fundamental Knowledge of Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: Learners, as practicing professionals, face practical demands to convert research findings into academic papers. Requires online tool accessibility via personal devices and a formative assessment environment emphasizing peer feedback and metacognitive reflection

learning_goals: Learners can establish individual thesis writing goals and action plans within one week and monitor progress step-by-step
Learners can analyze their writing process and derive improvement strategies using metacognitive strategies
Learners can apply techniques for drafting thesis manuscripts incorporating expert perspectives through peer feedback sessions
Learners share writing obstacle factors and engage in collaborative problem-solving experiences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
